title: Tuna-stuffed Peppadew Peppers
summary: Tuna-stuffed Peppadew Peppers is a gluten free, dairy free, whole 30, and pescatarian recipe with 1 servings. One portion of this dish contains approximately 49g of protein, 19g of fat, and a total of 523 calories. For $2.72 per serving, this recipe covers 49% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. 1 person has tried and liked this recipe. Head to the store and pick up albacore tuna, celery, lemon juice, and a few other things to make it today. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes about 10 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 94%. This score is spectacular. Similar recipes include TUNA-STUFFED PEPPADEW PEPPERS, Hummus + Peppadew Peppers, and Stovetop Cheddar Mac and Cheese With Peppadew Peppers.

winePairing.pairingText: Merlot, Pinot Noir, and rosé Wine are great choices for Tuna. Though fish is often paired with white wine, 'meatier' fish like tuna can absolutely go with red wine. A Rosé will also pair nicely, particularly if your tunan is prepared with ingredients better suited to a white wine. One wine you could try is Goldschmidt Vineyard Alexander Valley Chelsea Merlot. It has 4.8 out of 5 stars and a bottle costs about 20 dollars.

productMatches.title: Goldschmidt Vineyard Alexander Valley Chelsea Merlot
productMatches.description: Beautiful red raspberry, black cherry, and spice aromas. Full and round with plum, red currant, blackberry, and bay leaf flavors. The soft tannins give this wine a velvety smoothness and the chocolatey finish just goes on and on.
